summary: Jim Varney's recurring dim-bulb character Ernest P. Worrell returns in this film as a school maintenance man seeking to obtain a high school diploma.
cast: Jim Varney|Linda Kash|Bill Byrge|Jason Michas|Sarah Chalke|Gabe Khouth|Corrine Koslo|Russell Porter|Will Sasso|Duncan Fraser|French Tickner|Kevin McNulty|Ron Robinson|Judith Maxie|Fran Gebhard|Clint Bailie|William Samples|Betty Linde|David Keith|Lorena Gale|Michael Roberds|Bruce Arntson|John Bolton
keywords: ernest p. worrell character|high school|stupidity|bus driver|school bus
title: Ernest Goes to School
